subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Jesse Levine is a scrappy player with a two-handed backhand and a baseliner’s sensibilities, so one of Roger Federer’s agents invited him to practice with Federer for two weeks in July in Dubai.
snippet: Jesse Levine is a scrappy player with a two-handed backhand and a baseliner’s sensibilities, so one of Roger Federer’s agents invited him to practice with Federer for two weeks in July in Dubai.
